page.title: استان آیدین
page.text:
{{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = استان آیدین | native_name = Aydın ili | native_name_lang = <!-- ISO 639-2 code e.g. "fr" for French. If more than one, use {{lang}} instead --> | settlement_type = [[فهرست استان‌های ترکیه|استان]] | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | image_map1 =Aydın districts.png | mapsize1 = | map_alt1 = | map_caption1 = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | latd = 37 |latm = 43 |lats = 42 |latNS = N | longd = 27 |longm = 56 |longs = 14 |longEW = E | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_type = | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = [[فهرست کشورهای جهان|کشور]] | subdivision_name = {{TUR}} | subdivision_type1 = ناحیه | subdivision_name1 =[[ناحیه اژه|اژه]] | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = [[فهرست شهرهای ترکیه|مرکز]] | seat = [[انجیر]] | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = فرماندار | leader_name = Kerem Al | unit_pref = Metric<!-- or US or UK --> | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 8,007 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 989,862 | population_as_of = ۲۰۱۰ | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = [[کد پستی]] | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = ۰۲۵۶ | iso_code = TR-09 | registration_plate = ۰۹ | website = {{URL|http://www.aydin.gov.tr/}} | footnotes = }}
'''آیدین''' نام یکی از استان‌های [[ترکیه]] است.
مرکز آن شهر [[آیدین]] است.
شهرهای مهم دیگر این استان عبارتند از [[دیدیم]] و [[کوشاداسی]].
این استان مرکز تولید [[انجیر]] ترکیه است.
[[پرونده:Aydın Turkey Provinces locator.jpg|بندانگشتی|راست|270px|محل استان آیدین در ترکیه.]]
{{-}} == منابع == {{پانویس}} {{ویکی‌انبار-رده|Aydın Province}} Wikipedia contributors, "Aydın Province," Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia, http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Ayd%C4%B1n_Province&oldid=184237316 (accessed February 15, 2008).
